Topic Summary: Appeal against the Revenue Commissioners' decision to refuse relief from Vehicle Registration Tax (“VRT”), otherwise known as transfer of residence relief (“TOR”)
Tax Legislation: Section 134(1), Section 139 & Section 145 Finance Act 2001 (“FA 2001”)Statutory Instrument No. 59/1993, Vehicle Registration Tax (Permanent Reliefs) Regulations 1993, as amended, Directive 2009/55/EC (“the 2009 Directive”), Respondent’s Vehicle Registration Tax Section 2 Reliefs and Exemption Manual: Extenuating circumstances.
